titles.title: Gun Exchange Tax Incentive Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide tax incentives for businesses participating in gun exchange programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1285-1286)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/9/1994--Introduced. Gun Exchange Tax Incentive Act of 1994 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an itemized tax deduction for charitable contributions of property under qualified gun exchange programs. Directs the Attorney General to develop a written model program for business-sponsored gun exchange programs.
